title: Bug 12398 - Accessibility problems
description: Bug 12398 - Accessibility problems. I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas (eg. the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame or the content frame) before it starts working.
OB: When I launch the Help view on Win2K system dated 20020326, the tab key does not have any effect.
EB: The Help view should be designed to allow immediate keyboard navigation when launched.
SR: 1. Launch the Help view on a Win2K system dated 20020326. 2. Observe that the tab key does not have any effect. 3. Click on one of the 'live' areas such as the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame. 4. Observe that the tab key now has an effect and allows keyboard navigation.
